Hi,

Is it possible to catch an event after every DataGrid Row is loaded and filled with cells?

I have to modify cell binding and fill some  content after every  row is loaded and ready.

Or maybe is there some method to iterate through all rows in the DataGrid, after it is ready,  find the specific column
and cell in that row and make some changes.

I tested a lot but unsuccessfully.  DataGrid Loaded event is fired before LoadingRow which is for my opinion bad.

I have found the way how to achieve what I wanted but only for the current viewing row.
After LoadingRowDetails the row is filled with cells so it may be the right time to get cells but it is only valid for the current selected row.
All other rows, how ?
